item.title: Contest!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:6, topic:106373”]A TRUE minigame will not be brought about for a while.
Why?: because, 99.9% of minigames require some sort of timer. EVERY player has a different client (client.java) so if one is in the waiting room of castlewars for 4 minutes, and one person logs on. He’ll still have to wait 5 minutes, and the other person only one. I’ve met ONE person who has a proper timer, and he won’t share how. So until someone else figures it out and releases it, I doubt this will occur. The ONLY minigame that can be coded 100% properly just with the client.java is a 1 player minigame. Which honestly, the only good one EVER was fight caves, and it’s been tutified.[/quote]

Thats why you make a loop to make the timer the same for everyone on the masterlist.

Read full topic

item.title: Contest!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

A TRUE minigame will not be brought about for a while.
Why?: because, 99.9% of minigames require some sort of timer. EVERY player has a different client (client.java) so if one is in the waiting room of castlewars for 4 minutes, and one person logs on. He’ll still have to wait 5 minutes, and the other person only one. I’ve met ONE person who has a proper timer, and he won’t share how. So until someone else figures it out and releases it, I doubt this will occur. The ONLY minigame that can be coded 100% properly just with the client.java is a 1 player minigame. Which honestly, the only good one EVER was fight caves, and it’s been tutified.

Read full topic
